experience in Security and Compliance having worked with Enterprise Information Systems in the Internal IT Audit domain Expertise in Business Process Management and strategies related to integration of Governance Risk and Compliance Ability to leverage the existing IT infrastructure to establish quality IT audit processes and achieve SOX compliance Experience in Algorithm development Programming in C JAVA Analytics in R SAS EM Weka and Rapid Miner Sponsorship required to work in the US Work Experience Associate IT Analyst Security and Compliance Eaton Corporation Pune Maharashtra July 2013 to July 2015 SOX Business Process Improvement Conference Cleveland Ohio Presented Value Stream Mapping for IT Management Validation Process to a team of 20 Internal Auditors Performed Test of Controls independently as per Sarbanes Oxley Act of 2002 on multiple financially critical Information System such as AS400 UNIX Oracle MFGPro Systems with each server encompassing 100000 records Worked with Business Stakeholders and evaluated IT systems internal Control Design to identify gaps and measures required to optimize the auditing process as well as to ensure the reliability of the data on the systems Analysis of Repetitive IT SOX Gaps Conducted Root Cause Analysis for the enterprises 90 internal IT systems to identify cause of recurring gaps Investigated the source of the repetitive gaps from the data of 5 years and identified critical IT systems Examination of High Risk Gaps on UNIX systems Conducted study on numerous high risk issues on UNIX Systems for over 20 servers in one validation Closed the validation with no gaps and constructed new guidelines for auditing UNIX systems Education Master of Science in Management Information Systems University of South Florida Tampa
